Reviews.Title: NOT FOR MOBILE HOME
Reviews.Author: BJN
Reviews.Content: I BOUGHT THIS ITEM FOR MY ELDERLY PARENTS.  HOW DISAPPOINTED I WAS TO READ IN THE ENCLOSED MATERIAL THAT IT WON'T WORK IN A MOBILE HOME.  PLEASE PUT THAT INFO IN DESCRIPTION ONLINE.

Reviews.Title: Does exactly as described
Reviews.Author: kenneth j koprowski
Reviews.Content: Does exactly as described. We have had 2 home invasions in the area recently. This gives us peace of mind about not having to open the door to strangers. Well worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install and use
Reviews.Author: Lynn Urban
Reviews.Content: We bought this for our office building that gets minimal foot traffic.  It was easy to program and install and operate.  I just wish the internal intercoms came with a power cord - I have to buy that separately or run them on batteries all the time.

Reviews.Title: I Hear You
Reviews.Author: EC
Reviews.Content: The Chamberlain Ndis Wireless Doorbell & Intercom works great.  I wouild definitely recommend it.  You can know who is at your door before you open it.
